title: Autoimmune Diseases Overview
content:
Email info@autoimmune.org.nz or phone 021 244 4544. There’s also a private Facebook page.
There are also support organisations for people with different autoimmune diseases. Try searching the name of your condition in [the support section on the Healthify website](https://healthify.nz/support) to see what’s available.
####  Related topics on Healthify 
[Autoimmune disease topics](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/autoimmune-disease-topics "Autoimmune disease topics")
####  More information 
The following links provide further information about autoimmune diseases. Be aware that websites from other countries may have information that differs from New Zealand recommendations. 
[Autoimmune diseases – an overview(external link)](https://www.healthdirect.gov.au/autoimmune-diseases "Open external link") Health Direct, Australia  
[Autoimmune diseases(external link)](https://www.allergy.org.au/patients/autoimmunity/autoimmune-diseases "Open external link") Australasian Society of Clinical Immunology and Allergy, Australia  
[Autoimmune diseases(external link)](https://www.niehs.nih.gov/health/topics/conditions/autoimmune/index.cfm "Open external link") National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences, US
